name: Santa's Hat
description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day. Uses 2 hair accessory slots

name: Santa's Hat
description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day

name: Salvation Bow
description: Shoots a harmless heart-tipped arrow and allows use of the Forgiveness active skill. (Warning: If you use this skill against a monster, you will be flagged for PvP.)\0

name: Redemption Bow
description: Event item. Send a heart with love to select mutated creatures. The active skills "Heart Shot" and "Double Heart Shot" can be used

name: Apiga
description: Money used by cursed creatures. Take it to a magic lab for a reward

name: Golden Apiga
description: Rare money used by cursed creatures. Depending on the amount, you may use these to earn a reward in a lottery. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Pirate's Booty
description: One can receive Golden Apigas with a certain rate of chance by double clicking. If you are unlucky, you won't receive anything. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.)\0

name: Little Angel Wings (Event)
description: A wing-shaped hair accessory. This item is designed for use in events and cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Scroll of Guidance (Event)
description: Accuracy increases. Event reward item

description: Critical Damage increases. Event reward item

description: Critical Rate increases. Event reward item

description: P. Def. increases. Event reward item

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: A magical scroll that relocates user to the nearest village. An event reward

name: Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
description: A magic scroll that resurrects a dead character and restores his or her Exp. completely. An event reward

description: Golden Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item

description: Silver Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item

description: Top hat made of leather. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item

name: Santa's Antlers
description: Festive Santa hat with antlers. Ideal for celebrating the holidays. This item can only be equipped during the year end

name: Red Philosopher's Stone Transmutation Circle
